units.name: Warden
units.prompt: Push forward aggressively. Shield_wall facing the enemy cluster. If flanked, turn to face the biggest threat. Attack when possible.

units.name: Wraith
units.prompt: Cloak and move behind enemy lines. Target isolated enemies with shadow_strike. Save breach for the most dangerous enemy. Avoid being caught uncloaked.

units.name: Longshot
units.prompt: Position for clear sight lines. Prioritize killing wounded enemies with precision_shot. If forced to move, retreat away from threats. Suppressing_fire to slow rushers.

units.name: Veil
units.prompt: Stay cloaked and flank. Prioritize assassinating the enemy damage dealer. Use breach on sentinels to break their defensive posture. Recloak whenever it drops.

units.name: Seer
units.prompt: Scan priority targets each turn to reveal their strategy. Use recalibrate on your damage dealer to boost effectiveness. Stay behind allies and maintain range. Never get adjacent to enemy vectors.

units.name: Pulse
units.prompt: Stay adjacent to the most threatened ally. Use patch on the most wounded teammate. If all healthy, use overclock on your damage dealer.

actions.thinking: Round 1: Cloak immediately to become invisible, then advance toward enemy lines. Moving to (2,3) gets me closer to enemies while staying in center lane.
Round 1: cloak immediately as instructed. No enemies in range, so cloak first to become invisible for 3 turns, then move forward to close distance toward Longshot (the damage dealer).
Round 1: All allies full HP. Veil is adjacent damage dealer. Move south to stay with Veil, then overclock Veil for double abilities next turn.
Warden is in scan range (dist 3). Scan it to reveal enemy strategy. Then move south to maintain distance from frontline.
Pulse is in range at distance 4. Move forward to get closer for precision_shot, then use precision_shot on Pulse to deal 1 damage (reduced to 1dmg since I moved this turn).
Round 1: Push forward to close distance with enemies. Move to (2,2) to advance while staying in formation. Then shield_wall facing North to protect allies from enemy fire.
Overclocked with 2 abilities. Longshot is priority target at (3,2). Move behind to (3,1), shadow_strike for 2dmg (keeps cloak), then breach to turn them against Warden.

I'm cloaked with 2 turns remaining. Seer is at (2,4) facing S, and recon shows (2,5) is behind them and reachable in 1 move. I'll move behind Seer to (2,5), then use breach to turn them against their team. This removes their oracle abilities from the enemy and gives us control.

secondAction.addendum: Focus fire on Pulse with your abilities. They're the enemy medic and must be eliminated first to prevent healing.

actions.thinking: Orders say focus fire on Pulse, but I don't see Pulse in enemy list - Pulse is listed as an ally at (3,4). The actual priority target should be Wraith (enemy specter at 2,5, dist=1) who is in scan range. I'll scan Wraith to reveal their prompt, then attack them since they're adjacent.

Veil is wounded (4/5 HP) but 3 tiles away. Need to move closer to heal. Wraith enemy is close (dist 2), but priority is reaching Veil. Move south toward Veil at (3,1). Can move to (3,3) or (3,2). (3,2) gets me adjacent to wounded Longshot enemy but also closer to Veil. Will move to (3,3) to stay safer, then next turn can reach Veil.
Pulse is adjacent at (3,3), blocking precision_shot. Move away to (4,2) to create distance and enable precision_shot next turn. This maintains range to both enemies while escaping melee threat.
Move forward to (2,3) to close distance and position between enemies. Then shield_wall facing N to protect Wraith from Seer while threatening both enemies next turn.

I'm already behind Seer at (2,5) with them facing S at (2,4). I can breach them this turn since cooldown is done next turn. After breach, I'll control their next action—valuable for an oracle. Use breach now while positioned perfectly.

firstAction.addendum: Use recalibrate on Pulse to reveal positions and burn their cooldown

actions.thinking: Longshot is wounded and I'm already behind them. Move to (3,2) to get adjacent while staying behind, then shadow_strike to finish them off without breaking cloak.

Orders say focus fire on Pulse at (3,3). Pulse is 2 tiles away (diagonal), outside my attack range (adjacent only) but within scan range (≤4). I should move adjacent to Pulse first, then attack. Moving to (3,4) puts me adjacent to Pulse at (3,3).

Veil is wounded (4/5 HP) and adjacent at (3,2). Seer is full HP. Enemy Warden is adjacent at (2,3). I should heal Veil with patch since they need it, then move to stay between Veil and the Warden threat.
Pulse is wounded and adjacent at (2,2). Attack to eliminate, then shield_wall E to protect from Veil/Seer cluster.
Seer at (3,4) is perfectly positioned for breach - I'm behind them (they face E), only 1 tile away at (2,4). Move adjacent, then breach to take control of their next turn.

secondAction.addendum: Use scan on Veil at (3,2) to reveal their position and apply vulnerability

actions.thinking: Warden is 2 tiles away facing N. I'm already behind them at (3,2). Moving to (2,2) puts me directly behind and adjacent for breach. This breaks their defensive posture and gives us control of the sentinel.
actions.firstResult: Specter can move through but not end on occupied tile

secondAction.addendum: Move to (3,4) and use shield_wall facing S to protect the oracle

actions.thinking: Orders say scan Veil at (3,2). Wraith at (2,4) is adjacent, blocking scan per Oracle rules. Must move away from Wraith first, then scan Veil.
I'm at 2HP (wounded). Veil and Seer are both full HP. Warden is adjacent at (2,3). I should move away from Warden to avoid death, then heal myself since I'm the most wounded ally.
Orders are to move to (3,4) and shield_wall facing S to protect the oracle. Moving to (3,4) positions me between Wraith and the enemies, allowing me to block incoming attacks from the south.
Seer is at (4,3) facing S. I can reach (4,4) which is behind them and adjacent. Move there, then shadow_strike to deal 2 damage while staying effective. Breach is unavailable.
Warden is 2 tiles away, I can reach (3,3) which is directly behind them (they face N). Use breach to flip them to my control next turn, breaking their defensive line.

Seer is wounded (6/8 HP) and needs healing. Move to (4,2) to be adjacent to Seer at (4,3), then use patch to heal.
Already at (3,4). Use shield_wall facing S to protect against enemies positioned south of my location.
I'm already behind Warden at (3,4) facing N. I'm at (3,3) which is their south. Perfect breach position. Breach them to turn their defensive abilities against their own team.

firstAction.addendum: Move adjacent to Wraith and use shield_wall facing east to block their escape and protect our backline

actions.thinking: Seer at (4,3) is adjacent and I'm already behind them (facing S). Shadow_strike deals 2dmg while keeping cloak intact. This is optimal - no movement needed, stays stealthy.

Seer is wounded (6/8 HP) and currently adjacent at (4,3). Patch is unavailable (0/3 uses). I should use overclock on Seer to give them 2 abilities next turn since I can't heal. Need to stay adjacent to threatened ally.

Orders say scan Veil at (3,2), but Veil is actually at (3,3). I'm overclocked with 2 ability uses. Wraith is adjacent at (4,4) - I should scan them since they're in range and I don't have their full intel yet. Then use recalibrate on adjacent ally Veil to boost their effectiveness.

secondAction.addendum: Focus on eliminating Wraith at (4,4) with shadow_strike - they're the immediate threat to our oracle.

actions.thinking: Move to (4,5) to position adjacent to Wraith, then shield_wall facing E to block enemy specters from flanking our backline
Seer at (4,3) is adjacent and I'm already behind them (they face S, I'm at (4,4)). Shadow_strike for 2dmg while keeping cloak. Then move to (3,2) to get behind Veil for next turn.
Wraith is adjacent at (3,2) facing S - I'm directly behind them. Already cloaked. Use shadow_strike to deal 2dmg while maintaining cloak, then move to flank Warden or reposition.

Wraith just shadow_struck me and I'm at 3/8 HP. Pulse overclocked me last turn. Wraith is wounded and adjacent at (3,2). I should move away from Wraith to avoid another shadow_strike, then recalibrate Veil to boost our main damage dealer since both enemies are already scanned.

secondAction.addendum: Focus on eliminating Wraith first - they're wounded and dangerous. Use breach aggressively to finish them.

At 1HP, I'm critically wounded. Pulse (medic) is 2 tiles away and behind—perfect shadow_strike target (keeps cloak). Move to (4,2) behind Pulse, then shadow_strike for 2dmg while staying cloaked.
Wraith is critical HP at (4,2) - move adjacent to finish with shadow_strike. Then I can shadow_strike Warden next turn.

Seer is wounded (3/8 HP) and adjacent at (5,3). I'm out of patch heals (0/3). Best option is overclock on Seer to give them 2 abilities next turn, but this requires being adjacent. I'm already adjacent. However, overclock costs me 1 HP and I only have 2 HP left. With no enemies in range and Warden far away, I should move closer to Seer and use overclock to maximize their damage output next turn.
Overclocked with 2 abilities. Warden at (4,5) is scanned. Pulse (medic) wounded at (5,4). Use recalibrate on Pulse to boost effectiveness, then attack Warden from range 3.

Two critical enemies adjacent (Veil at 4,5 and Pulse at 5,4). Orders say attack when possible. Fortified gives 50% damage reduction if I don't move. Stay put and attack Pulse first (medic is priority), then attack Veil.
